Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan and the Circus
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's adventures within a circus, his unexpected heroism, and confrontation with a jealous former strongman, Matto Grasso.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Arrival and Introduction of Paul Bunyan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and sets the stage with news of the circus arriving in town, drawing in eager spectators.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Confrontation with Billings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Paul Bunyan, disguised, intervening in a threatening situation within the circus tent, leading to a fight with Billings and his companion.

sub_scenes.title: Bushwhack Attempt and Pistol Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene escalates the danger as Paul Bunyan faces a new threat - a pistol and a planned 'bushwhack' attempt, revealing a deeper conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Neutralizing Threats and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the immediate threats with Paul Bunyan overpowering his attackers, leading to an explanation of the conflict and a job offer from the circus owner.

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Jealousy and Arson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Matto Grasso's vengeful plot, driven by jealousy, to sabotage Paul Bunyan's performance and the circus by setting the tent on fire.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaimed Performance and Matto Grasso's Jealousy

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico's Release and Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's second attempt at sabotage by releasing Gigantico, and Paul Bunyan's quick intervention, leading to a chase after Matto Grasso.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Scheme: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico's Escape and Paul Bunyan's Swift Action
Continued Escape and Second Weight Attempt

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Resolution in the Arena
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in Paul Bunyan confronting and capturing Matto Grasso in the circus arena, using a trapeze bar to subdue him in a theatrical manner.

narrative_arcs.title: Spectator Observation and Paul Bunyan's Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Adventures and Hi-Toun
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts Marco Polo's fantastical adventures, starting with a Tibetan encounter, leading to a quest in Hi-Toun to find a missing princess and confront supernatural threats.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Encounter and Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage with a flashback to Marco Polo's Tibetan adventure and transitions to a strange encounter with a talking severed head in a forest.

sub_scenes.title: The Sacred Dagger and Journey to Hi-Toun
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a magical dagger given to Marco Polo and his subsequent journey to Hi-Toun, guided by the severed head's benefactor.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hi-Toun and Misinterpretation of Festivities

sub_scenes.title: Request to Find Princess Lotus
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Marco Polo's arrival in Hi-Toun, meeting the King, and being asked to help find the missing Princess Lotus.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco's Introduction and the King's Welcome
The King's Plea for Help Regarding Princess Lotus
Marco's Agreement to Help Find Princess Lotus

sub_scenes.title: Encounter with the Ogress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene takes a detour as Marco encounters a mourning woman who leads him to a mysterious castle and transforms into the Ogress of Tibet.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with a Mourning Woman in Need
The Mourning Woman's Plea and the Ominous Destination
Entering the Mysterious Castle and the Rat Revelation
The Ogress's Transformation and Marco's Imprisonment
Confrontation with Giant Rats and the Ogress
The Special Knife and Ogre's Defeat
Escape from Dungeon with Magic Knife
Misunderstood Mourning and Arrival at Palace

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of betrayal, greed, and revenge centered around a hidden treasure in Agra, India, and the long-term consequences of treachery.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Keeper Introduction and Penal Colony
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the narrative with a framing device by the Treasure Keeper, then shifts to a British penal colony where a prisoner is working under guard.

narrative_arcs.title: Officer's Request to Speak with Captain Brooking

sub_scenes.title: The Treasure Bargain and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the prisoner, Jordan, revealing the treasure to Captain Brooking and their agreement, followed by Brooking's betrayal and escape with the map.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of Treasure and Desperate Bargain
The Agreement and Promise of Escape
Release from Prison and Return to England
Return to England and Renewed Vengeance

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Deadly Treasure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Jordan's relentless pursuit of Captain Brooking to England, their confrontation, and a separate story of deadly treasure in an attic.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in England and Continued Vigil
Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal
The Wounded Man and the Chest

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Henry Northrup's investigation into the haunted Matthews estate, dealing with the vengeful spirit of Vincent Matthews and seeking resolution through forgiveness.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Dr. Styx and Vincent Matthews' Case
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx in a violent act and then shifts to the courtroom sentencing of Vincent Matthews for murder, setting up the backstory of the haunted estate.

sub_scenes.title: Northrup's Investigation Begins
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene initiates Henry Northrup's involvement as he is asked by Dr. Styx to investigate the Matthews estate, leading to Northrup's arrival and ominous warnings.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Matthews Place and Ominous Warning
Ignoring the Warning and Entering the House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews' Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Northrup's immediate encounter with the ghostly Vincent Matthews, their escalating threats, and the manifestation of Vincent's spectral form.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution through Forgiveness and Brotherly Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a philosophical and supernatural resolution, involving a cloaked figure guiding Vincent Matthews to redemption through his sister Rosalind's forgiveness and love.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of the Murdered Sister
Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: The Tragic Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical and tragic voyages of Henry Hudson, his relentless pursuit of the Northwest Passage, and the mutiny that led to his demise.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Hudson's Fate and Dutch Commission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a narration of Henry Hudson's tragic end and then flashes back to his commission by the Dutch East India Company.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Hudson

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and Hudson River Exploration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Hudson's first voyage, the crew's discontent, their exploration of the Hudson River, and the eventual decision to return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Acceptance of Failure and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage, Icebound, and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hudson's second, tragic voyage, where his ship gets trapped in ice, leading to winter quarters, escalating crew discontent, and ultimately mutiny.

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Rescued Daughter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Hassan, the Arabian Knight, on a mission to rescue the daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali from Tatar captors, facing combat and ultimately finding romance.

sub_scenes.title: Mission Assignment and Journey to Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene initiates Hassan's mission as he receives orders from the Caliph and begins his journey, encountering warnings and discovering Tatar presence at an oasis.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Oasis Discovery: Trail of the Tartars
Encounter and Warning in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Discovery of the Daughter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's infiltration of the Tartar camp by neutralizing a sentry and using his cloak as disguise, leading to eavesdropping and locating the daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Trial by Combat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes Hassan's discovery by Tartar guards, his capture, and the subsequent challenge issued by Kurgan for a trial by combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Internal Resolve and Desperate Need to Win

sub_scenes.title: Victory and Romantic Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's ingenious combat strategy, his triumph over Kurgan's warriors, fulfilling the agreement, and the beginnings of romance with the rescued daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Signal for Contest and Hassan's Strategy
Plea for Mercy and Honorable Agreement
Imminent Departure and a Parting Kiss
A Fine Reward and Continued Journey
